ej,bevit801,C,garcr901,Fighting $White Sox coach Bevington ejected by HP umpire Garcia at end of inning for fighting with Slaught since he did not that Slaught tried to bunt with a big lead

$Robin Yount came in to be a fifth infielder

$suicide squeeze attempt that was popped up; the Brewers got the third out at 1B as Mike Pagliarulo crossed HP;  the Brewers did not appeal the fact that Pagliarulo did not tag up at 3B before scoring and left the field; this would have been a 'fourth out' that the Brewers could have used to negate the run, which made no difference in the game's outcome
